job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: Sora is seeking a junior software engineer to help us build the next generation of tools for people teams and the employees they supportltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout SoraltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtSoras mission is to empower peoplefocused teams to create exceptional employee experiences These teams should be spending time with people but unfortunately all facets of People teams are bogged down by managing processes instead of helping people Thats where Sora comes in were building a product that streamlines the tedious and repetitive work People teams do every day from sending emails to assigning onboarding tasks to a new hires manager to syncing data across anywhere from 3 to 20 tools in a customers HR stackltbrgtltbrgtWere a pure startup with all the excitement that carries as a foundational member but with more thoughtfulness than the typical earlystage company Were committed to our values and we take our mission seriously Employee experience is in our DNA  we invest in processes that are inclusive and fair and we invest in our longterm mental physical and emotional healthltbrgtltbrgtSora was founded in late 2018 and launched in 2020 Weve fundraised from some of the best investors in the world and prioritize keeping a diverse group of investors and advisorsltbrgtltbrgtSora is committed to being a diverse equitable and inclusive workplace All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color national origin religion sexual orientation gender gender identity age physical disability or length of time spent unemployedltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are a small and mighty team of engineers with a passion for helping People teams do their best work Were empathetic scrappy nimble thoughtful and committed to excellence We listen to our teammates when they raise ideas or concerns We regularly provide guidance that shapes which features we prioritize as a company and then we drive the planning implementation and release of those featuresltbrgtltbrgtWe live all over the country and respective of COVID love to get together for board games surfing cooking Mario Kart and more ltbrgtltbrgtAs you grow in your career youll be supported by a handful of other senior engineers who work in a company culture that rewards collaboration Youll learn from some of the bestltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYoull develop and ship frontend and backend features that enable our customers to keep their employee data in sync across the 3rd party tools they use build Sora product tools on top of that data and help keep our application bug and jankfreeltbrgtltbrgtWe are an extremely customerfocused company so youll get firsthand exposure to learning a prioritization process that truly values customer needs Youll build and employ an array of skills that enable you to engage customers to help them get what they need out of Sora keeping security and best practices top of mind If youre looking for a starter role that gets you exposure to wearing a lot of hats in a small and energetic environment youll love this jobltbrgtltbrgtYoull be a driver for positive change to Soras engineering culture processes and technology Importantly youll help shape the future of the engineering organization and culture of the entire companyltbrgtltbrgtExperiences in these areas is not required but in case its interesting the main pieces of our stack includeltbrgtltulgtltligtNodeltligtltligtReactltligtltligtPostgresltligtltligtRedisltligtltligtAWSltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat we do look for is examples of rolling up your sleeves to get the job done being able to solve problems you hadnt encountered before and despite the awareness of challenges a desire to always push yourself to be betterltbrgtltbrgtPlease feel free to reach out to careerssoraco with any questions at all We look forward to hearing from youltbrgtltbrgt
